name: hot-keys
description: - Select Views Manu+Command palette or use the folling shortcut commands   Windows:hotkeys:**Ctrl+Shift+P** ### 2-It opens the command pelette and types Terminal:Select in the search box and selects the ***Terminal:Select Defualt Profile*** option. ### 3-Selecting the *Terminal: Select Defualt* Profile, shows one more window ### 4-It shows a list of all terminals and changes it to the terminal . **Changed to Command Prompt** Here onwards,opening a new terminal uses Command Prompt instead of Powershell.
